description: Inventory protection & management utilizing SQLite or MySQL as its backend Other blocks can also be protected individually, if configured.

permissions.description: Full administrative access to LWC
permissions.name: lwc.*

permissions.description: Gives the ability to basic LWC usage (almost everything except LWC admin.)
permissions.name: lwc.protect

permissions.description: Gives you absolutely power over LWC. As an LWC admin, you have no restrictions.
permissions.name: lwc.admin

permissions.description: Gives you access to every LWC command. Without lwc.admin or lwc.mod, you cannot open protections you do not own.
permissions.name: lwc.allcommands

permissions.description: Shows LWC notices
permissions.name: lwc.shownotices

permissions.description: Allows you to open anyone's protection but not remove them
permissions.name: lwc.mod

permissions.description: Denys you access to any block LWC can protect. For example, with this permission set, you cannot open even unprotected chests (if protectable.)
permissions.name: lwc.deny

permissions.description: Allows you to create every basic protection (public, private, password.)
permissions.name: lwc.create.*

permissions.description: Allows you to create a public protection.
permissions.name: lwc.create.public

permissions.description: Allows you to create a password protection.
permissions.name: lwc.create.password

permissions.description: Allows you to create a private protection.
permissions.name: lwc.create.private

permissions.description: Allows you to modify protections you own.
permissions.name: lwc.modify

permissions.description: Allows you to unlock password-protected protections.
permissions.name: lwc.unlock

permissions.description: Allows you to view the owner and other misc data on a protection.
permissions.name: lwc.info

permissions.description: Allows you to remove protections you own.
permissions.name: lwc.remove

permissions.description: Gives you access to every usable flag.
permissions.name: lwc.flag.*

permissions.description: Gives you access to every usable flag.
permissions.name: lwc.allflags

permissions.description: Allows you to use the redstone flag, which enables or disables the use of redstone on a protection depending on plugin settings.
permissions.name: lwc.flag.redstone

permissions.description: Allows you to use the magnet flag, which makes a protection such as a chest suck up dropped items in a specific radius around it.
permissions.name: lwc.flag.magnet

permissions.description: Allows a door to automatically close itself after 3 seconds (configurable.)
permissions.name: lwc.flag.autoclose

permissions.description: Gives you access to every usable mode, provided they are already disabled.
permissions.name: lwc.mode.*

permissions.description: Gives you access to every mode, provided they are already disabled.
permissions.name: lwc.allmodes

permissions.description: Allows you to use the persist flag, which allows you to use commands repeatably.
permissions.name: lwc.mode.persist

permissions.description: Allows you to use the drop transfer flag, which allows you to "drop" items into your chest from far away.
permissions.name: lwc.mode.droptransfer

permissions.description: Allows you to auto protect LWC protections regardless of how LWC is configured
permissions.name: lwc.autoprotect
